item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across market capitalisations, sectors, and individual companies. With over 4,000 stocks reporting, the aggregate data reveals a modest improvement in positive results, led by mid-cap companies, while large caps continue to face challenges amid a cautious economic backdrop. Time: 6 minutes ago

item.title: Are Healthy Life Agritec Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Healthy Life Agritec Ltd's latest results show a recovery with a 7.67% increase in net sales and a 68.35% rise in net profit compared to the previous quarter. However, ongoing challenges, including a significant stock price decline and low return on equity, raise concerns about long-term investor confidence. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Athena Global Technologies Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Athena Global Technologies Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are concerning, showing a net profit of ₹1.14 crores primarily due to a one-off income, while revenue declined by 47.26% year-on-year, indicating ongoing operational challenges and an unsustainable business model. The company faces significant financial strain with high employee costs and a deteriorating operating margin. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Uma Exports Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Uma Exports Ltd's latest results show strong sequential revenue growth of 38.31% to ₹560.44 crore, but a significant year-on-year net profit decline of 41.47% to ₹1.27 crore, indicating operational challenges and rising costs that may concern investors. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Vishvprabha Ventures Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Vishvprabha Ventures Ltd's Q3 FY26 results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹0.75 crore and an 80% revenue decline to ₹0.98 crore, alongside negative operating margins and deteriorating return on equity, indicating significant operational challenges and questions about its long-term viability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Oricon Enterprises Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Oricon Enterprises Ltd's latest results show a net profit of ₹8.83 crores, up 175.94% year-on-year, but this is largely due to other income, while core operations reported a loss of ₹7.28 crores and a significant decline in sales. Overall, the financial health is concerning due to ongoing operational challenges despite a strong balance sheet and good stock performance. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are KMF Builders & Developers Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: KMF Builders & Developers Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing zero revenue for the third consecutive quarter and widening losses, indicating significant operational challenges and questions about its business viability. Despite a stable balance sheet, the company's ongoing financial struggles and underperformance compared to peers raise investor skepticism. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Everest Organics Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Everest Organics Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a 16.49% decline in net sales and a 68.97% drop in net profit compared to the previous quarter, indicating significant operational challenges and rising cost pressures. Despite a year-on-year sales growth of 24.34% over nine months, profitability remains low, raising concerns about the company's financial stability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Wardwizard Foods & Beverages Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Wardwizard Foods & Beverages Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth of 139.23% year-on-year, but the company reported a net loss of ₹0.60 crores and declining operating margins, indicating ongoing profitability challenges that need to be addressed for sustainable growth. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Tarai Foods Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Tarai Foods Ltd's latest results are poor, showing no sales revenue for over seven quarters and a net loss of ₹0.11 crores in Q3 FY26, leading to a negative net worth of ₹2.70 crores and significant financial distress. The company's stock has also dropped 22% over the past year, highlighting ongoing operational challenges. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Tata Communications Ltd Forms Death Cross Signalling Bearish Trend
item.description: Tata Communications Ltd (NSE: 952728), a prominent player in the Telecom - Services sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting a deterioration in the stock’s medium to long-term momentum and raising concerns about sustained weakness ahead. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Sterlite Technologies Ltd Forms Golden Cross, Signalling Potential Bullish Breakout
item.description: Sterlite Technologies Ltd has recently formed a Golden Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average (DMA) crosses above the 200-day moving average. This development suggests a potential bullish breakout and a long-term momentum shift for the telecom equipment company, despite its current Sell mojo grade and recent minor price pullback. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: SRM Contractors Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: SRM Contractors Ltd, a micro-cap player in the construction sector, has recently formed a Death Cross—a technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average—suggesting a potential shift towards a bearish trend and signalling long-term weakness in the stock’s price momentum. Time: 3 hours ago

Time: 3 hours ago
